name: TrenchPunk
description:
Trench Punk Dev build. (Feedback is very much appreciated)

A dieselpunk Wolfenstein 3d inspired first person shooter.

Music by: Karl Casey @ White Bat Audio

https://whitebataudio.com/

Controls; 

WASD - Movement
F - Interaction key (Opening doors)
1,2,3...0 - Weapon select
P-Pause menu
Esc-Quits the game
